description: Revokes all active sessions for the authenticated user except the current session. Useful for logging out from all other devices while keeping the current session active.

status.description: Indicates successful revocation of other sessions

x-specs.given: An authenticated user with multiple active sessions
x-specs.then: Returns 200 OK and revokes all sessions except current one

executeQuery: INSERT INTO users (id, email, password_hash, name, email_verified, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (1, 'test@example.com', '$2a$10$YourHashedPasswordHere', 'Test User', true, NOW(), NOW())
INSERT INTO sessions (id, user_id, token, expires_at, created_at) VALUES (1, 1, 'current_session', NOW() + INTERVAL '7 days', NOW())
INSERT INTO sessions (id, user_id, token, expires_at, created_at) VALUES (2, 1, 'other_session_1', NOW() + INTERVAL '7 days', NOW())
INSERT INTO sessions (id, user_id, token, expires_at, created_at) VALUES (3, 1, 'other_session_2', NOW() + INTERVAL '7 days', NOW())

assertions.description: Other sessions are revoked in database

validateDatabaseState.query: SELECT * FROM sessions WHERE user_id = 1 AND id IN (2, 3) AND deleted_at IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM sessions WHERE id = 1 AND deleted_at IS NULL
